verses.verse: And I said, <WH559> Hear, <WH8085> I pray <WH4994> you, O heads <WH7218> of Jacob, <WH3290> and you princes <WH7101> of the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478> Is it not for you to know <WH3045> judgment? <WH4941>
Who hate <WH8130> the good, <WH2896> and love <WH157> the evil; <WH7451> who pluck <WH1497> off their skin <WH5785> from off them, and their flesh <WH7607> from off <WH5921> their bones; <WH6106>

Who <WH834> also eat <WH398> the flesh <WH7607> of my people, <WH5971> and flay <WH6584> their skin <WH5785> from off <WH5921> them; and they break <WH6476> their bones, <WH6106> and chop <WH6566> them in pieces, as for the pot, <WH5518> and as flesh <WH1320> within <WH8432> the caldron. <WH7037>

Then <WH227> shall they cry <WH2199> to the LORD, <WH3068> but he will not hear <WH6030> them: he will even hide <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from them at that time, <WH6256> as they have behaved <WH7489> themselves ill <WH7489> in their doings. <WH4611>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> concerning <WH5921> the prophets <WH5030> that make my people <WH5971> err, <WH8582> that bite <WH5391> with their teeth, <WH8127> and cry, <WH7121> Peace; <WH7965> and he that puts <WH5414> not into <WH5921> their mouths, <WH6310> they even prepare <WH6942> war <WH4421> against <WH5921> him.

Therefore <WH3651> night <WH3915> shall be to you, that you shall not have a vision; <WH2377> and it shall be dark <WH2821> to you, that you shall not divine; <WH7080> and the sun <WH8121> shall go <WH935> down over <WH5921> the prophets, <WH5030> and the day <WH3117> shall be dark <WH6937> over <WH5921> them.

Then shall the seers <WH2374> be ashamed, <WH954> and the diviners <WH7080> confounded: <WH2659> yes, they shall all <WH3605> cover <WH5844> their lips; <WH8222> for there is no <WH369> answer <WH4617> of God. <WH430>

But truly <WH199> I am full <WH4390> of power <WH3581> by the spirit <WH7307> of the LORD, <WH3068> and of judgment, <WH4941> and of might, <WH1369> to declare <WH5046> to Jacob <WH3290> his transgression, <WH6588> and to Israel <WH3478> his sin. <WH2403>

Hear <WH8085> this, <WH2063> I pray <WH4994> you, you heads <WH7218> of the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> and princes <WH7101> of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> that abhor <WH8581> judgment, <WH4941> and pervert <WH6140> all <WH3605> equity. <WH3477>
They build <WH1129> up Zion <WH6726> with blood, <WH1818> and Jerusalem <WH3389> with iniquity. <WH5766>

The heads <WH7218> thereof judge <WH8199> for reward, <WH7810> and the priests <WH3548> thereof teach <WH3384> for hire, <WH4242> and the prophets <WH5030> thereof divine <WH7080> for money: <WH3701> yet will they lean <WH8172> on the LORD, <WH3068> and say, <WH559> Is not the LORD <WH3068> among <WH7130> us? none <WH3808> evil <WH7451> can come <WH935> on us.

Therefore <WH3651> shall Zion <WH6726> for your sake <WH1558> be plowed <WH2790> as a field, <WH7704> and Jerusalem <WH3389> shall become <WH1961> heaps, <WH5856> and the mountain <WH2022> of the house <WH1004> as the high <WH1116> places of the forest. <WH3293>
